name: EMVI
description: Extramural Vascular Invasion, indicating tumor spread to nearby blood vessels.

attributes.name: Presence of EMVI
attributes.description: Indicates whether Extramural Vascular Invasion is present.

attributes.name: Location of EMVI
attributes.description: Specific series and image number where EMVI is identified.

name: Mesorectal Fascia (MRF) for T3 Tumors
description: Assessment of the tumor's proximity to the mesorectal fascia in T3 tumors.

attributes.name: Shortest distance of tumor to MRF
attributes.description: The minimum distance from the tumor to the mesorectal fascia, measured in millimeters.

attributes.name: Location of MRF proximity
attributes.description: Location and image/series number indicating the tumor's proximity to the MRF.

attributes.name: Threatening or invading MRF
attributes.description: Indicates whether a separate tumor deposit, lymph node, or EMVI is threatening or invading the MRF.

values.name: No
values.description: No separate tumor deposit, lymph node, or EMVI threatening or invading the MRF.

values.name: Yes
values.description: Presence of separate tumor deposit, lymph node, or EMVI threatening or invading the MRF.

name: Tumor Deposits
description: Identification of tumor deposits within the mesorectum, distinct from lymph nodes.

attributes.name: Presence of Tumor Deposits
attributes.description: Indicates the presence of tumor deposits in the mesorectum.

attributes.name: Details of Tumor Deposits
attributes.description: Series and image number of identified tumor deposits, including their number and location.

name: Lymph Nodes
description: Assessment of lymph nodes and tumor deposits in mesorectal/superior rectal region.

attributes.name: Mesorectal/superior rectal lymph nodes and tumor deposits status
attributes.description: Classification of mesorectal/superior rectal lymph nodes and tumor deposits.

values.name: N0
values.description: No visible lymph nodes or tumor deposits.

values.name: N+
values.description: Positive for lymph nodes/deposits, with specific criteria based on size and morphology.

values.name: Nx
values.description: Indeterminate status of lymph nodes or deposits.

attributes.name: Suspicious extra mesorectal lymph nodes
attributes.description: Indicates the presence of suspicious lymph nodes outside the mesorectal region.

values.name: No
values.description: No suspicious extra mesorectal lymph nodes.

values.name: Yes
values.description: Suspicious extra mesorectal lymph nodes present.

attributes.name: Details of extra mesorectal lymph nodes
attributes.description: Details of the extra mesorectal lymph nodes, including short axis diameter, location, and series/image number.

attributes.name: Locoregional lymph node locations
attributes.description: Specific locoregional lymph node locations and measurements, if applicable.

attributes.name: Distant lymph node locations (M1)
attributes.description: Specific distant lymph node locations and measurements, indicating metastasis (M1), if applicable.

name: Other Findings
description: Additional findings including bones, peritoneal metastases, or other incidental findings.

attributes.name: Details of Other Findings
attributes.description: Description of any other relevant findings not covered in the above categories.
